DataElement.preferredName: Long Acting Myeloid Growth Factor Administered Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No Indicator for question that asks if patient received long-acting myeloid growth factors

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Long Acting Myeloid Growth Factor Administered Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any of the synthetic, long-acting hematopoietic growth factors that stimulate the growth of myeloid cells._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Long Acting Myeloid Growth Factor Administered Therapeutic Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any of the synthetic, long-acting hematopoietic growth factors that stimulate the growth of myeloid cells.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Any of the synthetic, long-acting hematopoietic growth factors that stimulate the growth of myeloid cells.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received long-act
